section.title: Description
section.p: CMake automates the task to generate solution and projects files for a specific target build system or IDE.

section.title: Download
section.p: CMake is available for download at . Download the cmake-3.0.1-win32-x86.exe (2014-08-25).

section.title: Installation
section.p: Just execute the installer cmake-3.0.1-win32-x86.exe. The standard installation folder is %ProgramFiles%\CMake.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: There is no specific configuration of CMake necessary.

section.title: Usage
section.p: Just execute Sources\build.bat to generate the Microsoft Visual Studio solution and project files and to build the project in the Release configuration. The output is created in the folder Sources\BIN\Release.
If you want to build in Debug configuration, you need to adjust the Sources\build.bat accordingly. The output is then created in the folder Sources\BIN\Debug.
